CmdLine: yum -y install epel-release yum-plugin-ovl deltarpm &&     yum -y update &&     yum -y install curl                    dnsutils                    git                    less                    openssl                    python-httplib2                    python-jinja2                    python-keyczar                    python-paramiko                    python-pip                    python-setuptools                    PyYAML                    ssh                    sudo                    vim-minimal &&     pip install --upgrade pip &&     pip install ansible==${ANSIBLE_VERSION} &&     ansible --version &&     groupadd -g ${ANSIBLE_UID} -r ansible &&     useradd -u ${ANSIBLE_UID} -r -g ansible ansible &&     mkdir /code &&     mkdir /home/ansible && chown -R ansible: /home/ansible
Commands.Name: run
